summary: A killing machine from another world comes to Earth to kill humans.
cast: Eric Roberts|Arnold Vosloo|John Rhys-Davies|Tony Lo Bianco|Al Sapienza|Saulis Siparis|James W. Quinn|Sarah Kaite Coughlan|Miranda Jewel|Sophie Bielders|Alisa Hensley|Monika Verbutaite|Egle Zakareviciute|Evgenija Rusakova|Geoffrey Parish|Dziugas Siaurusaitis|Maxwell Meltzer|Kristina Markelyte|Viktorija Soldatenko|Tomas Ereminas|Aleksandr Baranov|Sergey Golovkin|Giedrius Nagys|Kevin Tenney
director: Director: Kevin Tenney (as Kevin S. Tenney)
title: Especies en peligro
